thread.title: Canada Ready to Compensate Kinder Morgan for Pipeline Losses

author: Paul Vieira
title: Canada Ready to Compensate Kinder Morgan for Pipeline Losses

organizations.name: canada ready to compensate kinder morgan for pipeline losses ottawa

text:
OTTAWA—Canada said Wednesday the government is prepared to compensate Kinder Morgan Inc. for losses it sustains on its proposed Trans Mountain pipeline expansion fueled by “politically-motivated” delays.
Canadian Finance Minister Bill Morneau told reporters the government also stands ready to compensate other investors who step in to takeover the pipeline should Kinder Morgan make good on its threat to walk away from the project on May 31.
